knowledgeGraph.title: Cedars-Sinai Comprehensive Transplant Center
knowledgeGraph.type: Medical center in West Hollywood, California

attributes.Address: 8900 Beverly Blvd 3rd floor, Los Angeles, CA 90048

organic.title: Cedars-Sinai Comprehensive Transplant Center
organic.snippet: The transplant center provides our patients with medical expertise in lung, heart, liver, kidney and pancreas transplantation. Meet The Team. See All Doctors.

organic.title: Transplant - Cedars-Sinai
organic.snippet: Call the Comprehensive Transplant Center team directly at 310‑423-2641, Monday‑Friday, 8 am-5 pm PT. You can also have us call you back at your convenience.

organic.title: Kidney & Pancreas Transplant | Cedars-Sinai
organic.snippet: Cedars-Sinai provides advanced care if you need a kidney or pancreas transplant. We specialize in finding solutions for complex cases.

organic.title: Heart Transplant - Cedars-Sinai
organic.snippet: Cedars-Sinai leads the nation in performing adult heart transplants. Learn about the advanced transplant care available from our expert surgeons.

organic.title: Cedars-Sinai Liver Disease & Transplant Center
organic.snippet: The staff at the transplant center serves patients needs from arranging appointments with specialists and helping sort out insurance issues.

relatedSearches.query: Best kidney transplant hospitals in California
